entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid was unhappy and he was hiding something, but he seemed determined not to accept help.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry watched him go, feeling miserable.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione was waving at him from the other side of the room.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood and none other than Rita Skeeter, ex-journalist on the Daily Prophet
